comment: Smart Data Models - ExcAC1A adapted to DTDL from smartdatamodels.org. Source: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/smart-data-models/dataModel.EnergyCIM/master/ExcAC1A/schema.json
description: Adapted from CIM data models. Modified IEEE AC1A alternator-supplied rectifier excitation system with different rate feedback source.

contents.name: alternateName
contents.comment: An alternative name for this item

contents.name: areaServed
contents.comment: The geographic area where a service or offered item is provided

contents.name: dataProvider
contents.comment: A sequence of characters identifying the provider of the harmonised data entity.

contents.name: dateCreated
contents.comment: Entity creation timestamp. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: dateModified
contents.comment: Timestamp of the last modification of the entity. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: description
contents.comment: A description of this item

contents.name: hvlvgates
contents.comment: Indicates if both HV gate and LV gate are active (HVLVgates). true = gates are used false = gates are not used. Typical Value = true. Default: False

contents.name: ka
contents.comment: Voltage regulator gain (Ka).  Typical Value = 400. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kc
contents.comment: Rectifier loading factor proportional to commutating reactance (Kc). Typical Value = 0.2. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kd
contents.comment: Demagnetizing factor, a function of exciter alternator reactances (Kd).  Typical Value = 0.38. Default: 0.0

contents.name: ke
contents.comment: Exciter constant related to self-excited field (Ke).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kf
contents.comment: Excitation control system stabilizer gains (Kf).  Typical Value = 0.03. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kf1
contents.comment: Coefficient to allow different usage of the model (Kf1).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kf2
contents.comment: Coefficient to allow different usage of the model (Kf2).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

contents.name: ks
contents.comment: Coefficient to allow different usage of the model-speed coefficient (Ks).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: name
contents.comment: The name of this item.

contents.name: seve1
contents.comment: Exciter saturation function value at the corresponding exciter voltage, Ve1, back of commutating reactance (Se[Ve1]).  Typical Value = 0.1. Default: 0.0

contents.name: seve2
contents.comment: Exciter saturation function value at the corresponding exciter voltage, Ve2, back of commutating reactance (Se[Ve2]).  Typical Value = 0.03. Default: 0.0

contents.name: source
contents.comment: A sequence of characters giving the original source of the entity data as a URL. Recommended to be the fully qualified domain name of the source provider, or the URL to the source object.

contents.name: ta
contents.comment: Voltage regulator time constant (Ta).  Typical Value = 0.02. Default: 0

contents.name: tb
contents.comment: Voltage regulator time constant (Tb).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

contents.name: tc
contents.comment: Voltage regulator time constant (T).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

contents.name: te
contents.comment: Exciter time constant, integration rate associated with exciter control (Te).  Typical Value = 0.8. Default: 0

contents.name: tf
contents.comment: Excitation control system stabilizer time constant (Tf).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0

contents.name: vamax
contents.comment: Maximum voltage regulator output (V).  Typical Value = 14.5. Default: 0.0

contents.name: vamin
contents.comment: Minimum voltage regulator output (V).  Typical Value = -14.5. Default: 0.0

contents.name: ve1
contents.comment: Exciter alternator output voltages back of commutating reactance at which saturation is defined (Ve1).  Typical Value = 4.18. Default: 0.0

contents.name: ve2
contents.comment: Exciter alternator output voltages back of commutating reactance at which saturation is defined (Ve2).  Typical Value = 3.14. Default: 0.0

contents.name: vrmax
contents.comment: Maximum voltage regulator outputs (Vrmax).  Typical Value = 6.03. Default: 0.0

contents.name: vrmin
contents.comment: Minimum voltage regulator outputs (Rrmin).  Typical Value = -5.43. Default: 0.0

contents.name: owner
contents.comment: A List containing a JSON encoded sequence of characters referencing the unique Ids of the owner(s)

contents.name: address
contents.comment: The mailing address
